channel.title: Microsoft Developer Blogs
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, announcements, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Upgrade Your Windows Forms .NET Projects to the Latest .NET Version for Enhanced Security】将 Windows 窗体 .NET 项目升级到最新 .NET 版本以增强安全性
item.description: 【Each release of .NET introduces a host of new features and bug fixes that enhance both performance and security. To leverage these benefits both service and desktop application developers must upgrade their applications to the latest .NET versions. Just like other developers wanting to take advantage of the latest .NET enhancements, we are updating our […]】.NET 的每个版本都引入了许多新功能和错误修复，可增强性能和安全性。为了利用这些优势，服务和桌面应用程序开发人员必须将其应用程序升级到最新的 .NET 版本。就像其他想要利用最新 .NET 增强功能的开发人员一样，我们正在更新我们的 [...]

item.title: 【It rather involved being on the other side of the airtight hatchway: Defeating ASLR after you’ve gained RCE via ROP】它更涉及到在密闭舱口的另一边：通过 ROP 获得 RCE 后击败 ASLR
item.description: 【If you defeat ASLR, then you can defeat ASLR.】如果你打败了ASLR，那么你就能打败ASLR。

item.title: 【Microsoft 365 Certification control spotlight: Security incident response】Microsoft 365 认证控制焦点：安全事件响应
item.description: 【Discover how Microsoft 365 Certification verifies security incident response best practices.】了解 Microsoft 365 认证如何验证安全事件响应最佳实践。

item.title: 【.NET Upgrade Assistant Now Supports Upgrading to Centralized Package Mangement】.NET升级助手现在支持升级到集中包管理
item.description: 【Learn how to use the .NET Upgrade Assistant tool to upgrade your projects to use NuGet Central Package Management (CPM).】了解如何使用 .NET Upgrade Assistant 工具升级项目以使用 NuGet Central Package Management (CPM)。

item.title: 【How to correctly use access tokens and ID tokens in your client application】如何在客户端应用程序中正确使用访问令牌和 ID 令牌
item.description: 【Explore the differences between access tokens and ID tokens and how to use them securely in your applications. This blog post explains why access tokens should be treated as opaque by client apps, and offers best practices for secure token handling.】探索访问令牌和 ID 令牌之间的差异以及如何在应用程序中安全地使用它们。这篇博文解释了为什么客户端应用程序应将访问令牌视为不透明，并提供安全令牌处理的最佳实践。

item.title: 【Join the Microsoft 365 Copilot: Developer Camp】加入 Microsoft 365 Copilot：开发者营
item.description: 【📅 Date: November 07, 2024 | 🕘 Time: 9:00 AM – 10:30 AM (PT) |📍 Virtual Live Event: https://aka.ms/copilotdevcamp/live We’re thrilled to announce Microsoft 365 Copilot: Developer Camp 2024 – an exciting live event designed to inspire and empower developers to build next-generation Microsoft 365 Copilot Agents. We are inviting you in this adventure to […]】📅 日期：2024 年 11 月 7 日 | 🕘 时间：上午 9:00 – 上午 10:30（太平洋时间）|📍 虚拟直播活动：https://aka.ms/copilotdevcamp/live 我们很高兴地宣布 Microsoft 365 Copilot：开发者营 2024 – 一场激动人心的现场活动旨在激励和授权开发人员构建下一代 Microsoft 365 Copilot Agent。我们邀请您参加这次冒险[...]

item.title: 【Automate Power Platform Environment Creation & Solution Imports with GitHub Actions】使用 GitHub Actions 自动创建 Power Platform 环境和导入解决方案
item.description: 【Automate Power Platform Environment Creation & Solution Imports with GitHub Actions Automating your CI/CD pipeline for Power Platform solutions can streamline your development process and reduce manual tasks. By integrating GitHub Actions, you can automatically create environments, import solutions, and even clean up environments when issues arise. This blog post will walk you through a […]】使用 GitHub Actions 自动化 Power Platform 环境创建和解决方案导入 自动化 Power Platform 解决方案的 CI/CD 管道可以简化您的开发流程并减少手动任务。通过集成 GitHub Actions，您可以自动创建环境、导入解决方案，甚至在出现问题时清理环境。这篇博文将引导您完成[...]

item.title: 【eShop infused with AI – a comprehensive intelligent app sample with Semantic Kernel】注入 AI 的 eShop – 具有语义内核的综合智能应用程序示例
item.description: 【Today we’re featuring a sample application, called eShop. You can read the entire blog post and steps for running the application here: eShop infused with AI – a comprehensive intelligent app sample – .NET Blog Below, we have a brief summary of eShop and the integration with Semantic Kernel. Introducing eShop “support with AI” edition […]】今天我们将介绍一个名为 eShop 的示例应用程序。您可以在此处阅读完整的博客文章和运行应用程序的步骤：eShop 注入 AI – 全面的智能应用程序示例 – .NET 博客 下面，我们对 eShop 以及与 Semantic Kernel 的集成进行了简要总结。推出 eShop“AI 支持”版本 [...]

item.title: 【Azure SDK Release (October 2024)】Azure SDK 版本（2024 年 10 月）
item.description: 【The Azure SDKs release every month. This post includes the month's highlights and release notes.】Azure SDK 每月发布一次。这篇文章包括本月的亮点和发行说明。

item.title: 【Using Entra profile information in Azure DevOps】在 Azure DevOps 中使用 Entra 配置文件信息
item.description: 【We’re excited to announce the ability to use Entra profile information in Azure DevOps. This has been a long-standing feature request from the community (ex. profile, picture, email, and name). Beyond the convenience of configuring profile information in one place and ensuring the accuracy of personal information, using Entra profile information in Azure DevOps provides […]】我们很高兴地宣布能够在 Azure DevOps 中使用 Entra 配置文件信息。这是社区长期提出的功能请求（例如个人资料、图片、电子邮件和姓名）。除了在一个地方配置配置文件信息并确保个人信息的准确性的便利之外，在 Azure DevOps 中使用 Entra 配置文件信息还提供了 [...]
